about_the_game:
Game Features:

- Horror Atmosphere: Prepare for terrifying events and encounters after sunset that will test your courage and skills.

- Lighthouse Upgrades: Enhance the lighthouse with unusual upgrades to help you survive the night.

- Survival and Resource Management: Manage resources and make strategic decisions to ensure your survival.- The Importance of the Lighthouse Light: Keep the lighthouse running to ensure the safety of passing ships, or take risks for your own benefit.


- Dark Graphics and Sound Design: Immerse yourself in a tense and haunting atmosphere with unique visuals and sound design.

Join an unforgettable journey in Pharos Light, where survival becomes an art, and every action you take matters. Inspired by the dark and mysterious atmosphere of "The Lighthouse," this game will not only test your bravery but also force you to face your fears, drawing you into a unique world of horror and suspense.

Pharos Light is a unique survival horror game inspired by the atmosphere and motifs of the famous film "The Lighthouse." You take on the role of a lighthouse keeper on a mysterious island, where your primary task is to maintain the lighthouse’s operation so that ships can safely avoid the treacherous rocks. However, after the sun sets, strange and frightening events begin to unfold on the island.

During the day, you do everything possible to prepare for the night: gathering resources, reinforcing defenses, and upgrading the lighthouse with the most unusual enhancements to help you survive. Keeping the lighthouse lit is critically important, but sometimes, tough decisions will need to be made. You may even have to make sacrifices, letting ships crash onto the rocks to collect valuable resources from their wreckage in the morning.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800GT / ATI Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Pharos Light is a survival horror game inspired by “The Lighthouse” and Lovecraft. Upgrade the Lighthouse with unique equipment, develop the island, and survive the night.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
